trans-unit.source: Provides methods to write to an XPS document or print queue.
trans-unit.target: Proporciona métodos para escribir en un documento XPS o en una cola de impresión.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter> has no constructor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter> no tiene ningún constructor.

trans-unit.source: To create an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter>, use the static <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.CreateXpsDocumentWriter%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> class or use one of the static <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.CreateXpsDocumentWriter%2A> methods of the <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> class.
trans-unit.target: Para crear un <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter>, utilice el método estático <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.CreateXpsDocumentWriter%2A> método de la <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> de clase o utilice uno de los métodos estático <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.CreateXpsDocumentWriter%2A> métodos de la <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> clase.

trans-unit.source: The document or the queue that creates the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter> becomes the target to which it writes.
trans-unit.target: El documento o la cola que crea el <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter> se convierte en el destino en el que escribe.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to create an instance of the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter> class.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se muestra cómo se crea una instancia de la clase <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter>.

trans-unit.source: Cancels the current <see cref="Overload:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WriteAsync" /> operation.
trans-unit.target: Cancela la operación <see cref="Overload:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WriteAsync" /> actual.

trans-unit.source: No asynchronous write operation is in progress.
trans-unit.target: No hay operaciones de escritura asincrónica en curso.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument" /> that can write <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> objects to a document or print queue.
trans-unit.target: Devuelve un objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument" /> que puede escribir objetos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> en un documento o una cola de impresión.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument> writes to the same target <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> or <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> as the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter> that creates the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument>.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument> escribe en el mismo destino <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> o <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> como el <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter> que crea el <xref:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument>.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.CreateVisualsCollator%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: En el siguiente ejemplo, se muestra cómo utilizar el método <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.CreateVisualsCollator%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument" /> that can write <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> objects to a document or print queue.
trans-unit.target: Devuelve un objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument" /> que puede escribir objetos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> en un documento o una cola de impresión.

trans-unit.source: The new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument" />.
trans-unit.target: Nuevo objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument> writes to the same target <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> or <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> as the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter> that creates the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument>.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument> escribe en el mismo destino <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> o <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> como el <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter> que crea el <xref:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument>.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.CreateVisualsCollator%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: En el siguiente ejemplo, se muestra cómo utilizar el método <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.CreateVisualsCollator%2A>.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicket" /> that specifies the default printing preferences for the document sequence.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicket" /> que especifica las preferencias de impresión predeterminadas de la secuencia de documentos.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicket" /> that represents the default printing preferences for each document.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicket" /> que representa las preferencias de impresión predeterminadas de cada documento.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument" /> that can write <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> objects with <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicket" /> settings to an XPS document or print queue.
trans-unit.target: Devuelve un objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument" /> que puede escribir objetos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> con valores de <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicket" /> en un documento XPS o una cola de impresión.

trans-unit.source: The new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument" /> that writes <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> elements with <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicket" /> settings to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" />.
trans-unit.target: El nuevo objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument" /> que escribe elementos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> con valores de <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicket" /> en <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument> writes to the same target <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> or <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> as the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter> that creates the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument>.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument> escribe en el mismo destino <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> o <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> como el <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter> que crea el <xref:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument>.

trans-unit.source: This method does not validate or modify the specified `documentPrintTicket` for a particular <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>.
trans-unit.target: Este método no valida ni modificar especificado `documentPrintTicket` para un determinado <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>.

trans-unit.source: If necessary, use the <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A> method to create a <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> that is specific to the <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> and valid for a specified printer.
trans-unit.target: Si es necesario, utilice el <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A> método para crear un <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> que es específico de la <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> y es válido para una impresora determinada.

trans-unit.source: Writes synchronously to an XPS document or print queue.
trans-unit.target: Escribe de forma sincrónica en un documento XPS o una cola de impresión.

trans-unit.source: The path of the source document.
trans-unit.target: Ruta de acceso del documento de origen.

trans-unit.source: Writes synchronously a specified [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] document to the target <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" /> or <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintQueue" />.
trans-unit.target: Escribe sincrónicamente un determinado documento [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] en la clase <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" /> o <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintQueue" /> de destino.

trans-unit.source: Although the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> class has a singular name, an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> can be one <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> or a set of multiple documents.
trans-unit.target: Aunque la <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> clase tiene un nombre en singular, un <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> puede ser una <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> o un conjunto de varios documentos.

trans-unit.source: This method adds the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> elements in the source to the set of <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> elements in the target <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> or <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>.
trans-unit.target: Este método agrega el <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> elementos en el origen para el conjunto de <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> elementos en el destino <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> o <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>.

trans-unit.source: This <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.Write%2A> method will reserialize the specified [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] document which will remove all content from the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> that is not required to be preserved by the [XML Paper Specification](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761).
trans-unit.target: Esto <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.Write%2A> método volverá a serializar especificado [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] documento lo que se quitará todo el contenido de la <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> que no es necesario que se conserven por la [XML Paper Specification](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761).

trans-unit.source: The reserialization will also remove all extensions from the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> markup, including any extended [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] content.
trans-unit.target: El reserialization, también se quitarán todas las extensiones de la <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> marcado, incluidos los extendidos [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] contenido.

trans-unit.source: By design this <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.Write%2A> method does not call the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WritingPrintTicketRequired> event.
trans-unit.target: Este diseño <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.Write%2A> método no llama a la <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WritingPrintTicketRequired> eventos.

trans-unit.source: An object that contains a pointer to unpaginated source material and also contains methods for paginating the material.
trans-unit.target: Objeto que contiene un puntero a material de origen sin paginar y también contiene métodos para paginar el material.

trans-unit.source: Writes synchronously paginated content from a specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator" /> to the target <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" /> or <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintQueue" />.
trans-unit.target: Escribe contenido paginado de forma sincrónica de una clase <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator" /> especificada en la clase <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" /> o <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintQueue" /> de destino.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.Write%2A> method to write to an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] document.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se muestra cómo utilizar el <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.Write%2A> método para escribir en un [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] documento.

trans-unit.source: A document that is written to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" />.
trans-unit.target: Documento que se escribe en <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" />.

trans-unit.source: Writes synchronously a specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument" /> to the target <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" /> or <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintQueue" />.
trans-unit.target: Escribe de forma sincrónica un <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument" /> especificado en <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" /> o <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintQueue" /> de destino.

trans-unit.source: Although the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> class has a singular name, an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> can be one <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> or a set of multiple documents.
trans-unit.target: Aunque la <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> clase tiene un nombre en singular, un <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> puede ser una <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> o un conjunto de varios documentos.

trans-unit.source: This method adds a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> to the set.
trans-unit.target: Este método agrega un <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> al conjunto.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use this method to write to an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] document.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se muestra cómo utilizar este método para escribir en un [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] documento.

trans-unit.source: A set of documents that is written to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" />.
trans-unit.target: Conjunto de documentos que se escribe en <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" />.

trans-unit.source: Writes synchronously a specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence" /> to the target <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" /> or <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintQueue" />.
trans-unit.target: Escribe de forma sincrónica un <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence" /> especificado en <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" /> o <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintQueue" /> de destino.

trans-unit.source: Although the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> class has a singular name, an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> can be one <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> or a set of multiple documents.
trans-unit.target: Aunque la <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> clase tiene un nombre en singular, un <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> puede ser una <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> o un conjunto de varios documentos.

trans-unit.source: This method adds a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> or a set of <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> elements to the existing set.
trans-unit.target: Este método agrega un <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> o un conjunto de <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> elementos al conjunto existente.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.Write%2A> method to write a sequence of [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] documents.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se muestra cómo utilizar el <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.Write%2A> método para escribir una secuencia de [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] documentos.

trans-unit.source: A page that is written to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" />.
trans-unit.target: Página que se escribe en <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" />.

trans-unit.source: Writes synchronously a specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage" /> to the target <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" /> or <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintQueue" />.
trans-unit.target: Escribe de forma sincrónica un <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage" /> especificado en <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" /> o <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintQueue" /> de destino.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> that is written.
trans-unit.target: Elemento <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> que se escribe.

trans-unit.source: Writes synchronously a specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> to the target <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" /> or <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintQueue" />.
trans-unit.target: Escribe de forma sincrónica un <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> especificado en <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" /> o <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintQueue" /> de destino.

trans-unit.source: To batch write a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual>, use <xref:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument>.
trans-unit.target: Para escritura por lotes en una <xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual>, utilice <xref:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument>.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.Write%2A> method to write a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual> to an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] document.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se muestra cómo utilizar el <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.Write%2A> método para escribir una <xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual> a una [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] documento.

trans-unit.source: The path of the source document.
trans-unit.target: Ruta de acceso del documento de origen.

trans-unit.source: An indication of whether notification is enabled.
trans-unit.target: Indicación de si la notificación está habilitada.

trans-unit.source: Writes synchronously a specified [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] document to the target <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" /> or <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintQueue" />.
trans-unit.target: Escribe sincrónicamente un determinado documento [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] en la clase <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" /> o <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintQueue" /> de destino.

trans-unit.source: When `notificationLevel` is disabled, the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter> copies the serialized[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] document to the target <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> or <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> that created the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter>.
trans-unit.target: Cuando `notificationLevel` está deshabilitado, el <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter> copia serializado[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] documento al destino <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> o <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> que creó el <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter>.

trans-unit.source: When `notificationLevel` is enabled, the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter> first deserializes the document, next reserializes it, and then writes it to the target with progress notifications as each page is output.
trans-unit.target: Cuando `notificationLevel` está habilitada, el <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter> primero deserializa el documento, a continuación vuelve a serializar y, a continuación, lo escribe en el destino con notificaciones de progreso sea de cada página de salida.

trans-unit.source: Although the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> class has a singular name, an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> can be one <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> or a set of multiple documents.
trans-unit.target: Aunque la <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> clase tiene un nombre en singular, un <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> puede ser una <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> o un conjunto de varios documentos.

trans-unit.source: This method adds the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> elements in the source to the sequence of <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> elements in the target <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> or <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>.
trans-unit.target: Este método agrega el <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> elementos en el origen de la secuencia de <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> elementos en el destino <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> o <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>.

trans-unit.source: If `notificationLevel` is specified as <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentNotificationLevel.ReceiveNotificationEnabled>, notifications are produced only when the document is serialized, not printed.
trans-unit.target: Si `notificationLevel` se especifica como <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentNotificationLevel.ReceiveNotificationEnabled>, se generan notificaciones solo cuando se serializa el documento, no se imprimen.

trans-unit.source: To receive notifications the document must be reserialized.
trans-unit.target: Para recibir notificaciones que del documento debe ser vuelve a serializar.

trans-unit.source: When a document is reserialized all content from the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> that is not required to be preserved by the [XML Paper Specification (XPS)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761) is removed.
trans-unit.target: Cuando se vuelve a serializar un documento de todo el contenido de la <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> que no es necesario que se conserven por la [XML Paper Specification (XPS)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761) se quita.

trans-unit.source: The reserialization will also remove all extensions from the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> markup, including any extended [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] content.
trans-unit.target: El reserialization, también se quitarán todas las extensiones de la <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> marcado, incluidos los extendidos [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] contenido.

trans-unit.source: If `notificationLevel` is specified as <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentNotificationLevel.ReceiveNotificationDisabled> the document will not be reserialized and any extended content will be preserved, even when printed.
trans-unit.target: Si `notificationLevel` se especifica como <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentNotificationLevel.ReceiveNotificationDisabled> el documento no se vuelve a serializar y se conservará todo el contenido extendido, incluso cuando se imprima.

trans-unit.source: By design this <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.Write%2A> method does not call the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WritingPrintTicketRequired> event.
trans-unit.target: Este diseño <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.Write%2A> método no llama a la <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WritingPrintTicketRequired> eventos.

trans-unit.source: An object that contains a pointer to unpaginated source material and also contains methods for paginating the material.
trans-unit.target: Objeto que contiene un puntero a material de origen sin paginar y también contiene métodos para paginar el material.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicket" /> that represents the default printing preferences for material.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicket" /> que representa las preferencias de impresión predeterminadas del material.

trans-unit.source: Writes synchronously paginated content from a specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator" /> together with a <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicket" /> to the target <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" /> or <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintQueue" />.
trans-unit.target: Escribe de forma sincrónica contenido paginado de un <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator" /> junto con un <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicket" /> en <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" /> o <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintQueue" /> de destino.

trans-unit.source: This method does not validate or modify the specified `printTicket` for a particular <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>.
trans-unit.target: Este método no valida ni modificar especificado `printTicket` para un determinado <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>.

trans-unit.target: Escribe de forma asincrónica en el <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" /> o <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintQueue" /> que creó el <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter" />.

trans-unit.target: Escribe de forma asincrónica un determinado documento [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] en la clase <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" /> o <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintQueue" /> de destino.

trans-unit.source: Although the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> class has a singular name, an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> can be one <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> or a set of multiple documents.

trans-unit.source: This method adds the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> elements in the source to the set of <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> elements in the target <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> or <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>.
trans-unit.target: Este método agrega el <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> elementos en el origen para el conjunto de <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> elementos en el destino <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> o <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>.

trans-unit.source: This <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WriteAsync%2A> method will reserialize the specified [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] document which will remove all content from the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> that is not required to be preserved by the [XML Paper Specification](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761).
trans-unit.target: Esto <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WriteAsync%2A> método volverá a serializar especificado [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] documento lo que se quitará todo el contenido de la <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> que no es necesario que se conserven por la [XML Paper Specification](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761).

trans-unit.source: The reserialization will also remove all extensions from the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> markup, including any extended [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] content.
trans-unit.target: El reserialization, también se quitarán todas las extensiones de la <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> marcado, incluidos los extendidos [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] contenido.

trans-unit.source: By design this <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WriteAsync%2A> method does not call the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WritingPrintTicketRequired> event.
trans-unit.target: Este diseño <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WriteAsync%2A> método no llama a la <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WritingPrintTicketRequired> eventos.

trans-unit.target: Objeto que contiene un puntero a material de origen sin paginar y también contiene métodos para paginar el material.

trans-unit.target: Para escritura por lotes en una <xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual>, utilice <xref:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument>.

trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se muestra cómo utilizar este método para escribir una <xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual> a una [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] documento.

trans-unit.source: The path of the source document.
trans-unit.target: Ruta de acceso del documento de origen.

trans-unit.source: An indication of whether notification is enabled.
trans-unit.target: Indicación de si la notificación está habilitada.

trans-unit.source: Writes asynchronously a specified [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] document with notification option to the target <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" /> or <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintQueue" />.
trans-unit.target: Escribe de forma asincrónica un documento [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] especificado con la opción de notificación en el <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" /> o <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintQueue" /> de destino.

trans-unit.source: When `notificationLevel` is disabled, the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter> copies the serialized [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] document to the target <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> or <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> that created the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter>.
trans-unit.target: Cuando `notificationLevel` está deshabilitado, el <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter> copia serializado [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] documento al destino <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> o <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> que creó el <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter>.

trans-unit.source: When `notificationLevel` is enabled, the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter> first deserializes the document, next reserializes it, and then writes it to the target with progress notifications as each page is output.
trans-unit.target: Cuando `notificationLevel` está habilitada, el <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter> primero deserializa el documento, a continuación vuelve a serializar y, a continuación, lo escribe en el destino con notificaciones de progreso sea de cada página de salida.

trans-unit.source: Although the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> class has a singular name, an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> can be one <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> or a set of multiple documents.
trans-unit.target: Aunque la <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> clase tiene un nombre en singular, un <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> puede ser una <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> o un conjunto de varios documentos.

trans-unit.source: This method adds the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> elements in the source to the sequence of <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> elements in the target <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> or <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>.
trans-unit.target: Este método agrega el <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> elementos en el origen de la secuencia de <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> elementos en el destino <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> o <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>.

trans-unit.source: If `notificationLevel` is specified as <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentNotificationLevel.ReceiveNotificationEnabled>, notifications are produced only when the document is serialized, not printed.
trans-unit.target: Si `notificationLevel` se especifica como <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentNotificationLevel.ReceiveNotificationEnabled>, se generan notificaciones solo cuando se serializa el documento, no se imprimen.

trans-unit.source: To receive notifications the document must be reserialized.
trans-unit.target: Para recibir notificaciones que del documento debe ser vuelve a serializar.

trans-unit.source: When a document is reserialized all content from the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> that is not required to be preserved by the [XML Paper Specification](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761) is removed.
trans-unit.target: Cuando se vuelve a serializar un documento de todo el contenido de la <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> que no es necesario que se conserven por la [XML Paper Specification](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761) se quita.

trans-unit.source: The reserialization will also remove all extensions from the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> markup, including any extended [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] content.
trans-unit.target: El reserialization, también se quitarán todas las extensiones de la <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> marcado, incluidos los extendidos [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] contenido.

trans-unit.source: If `notificationLevel` is specified as <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentNotificationLevel.ReceiveNotificationDisabled> the document will not be reserialized and any extended content will be preserved, even when printed.
trans-unit.target: Si `notificationLevel` se especifica como <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentNotificationLevel.ReceiveNotificationDisabled> el documento no se vuelve a serializar y se conservará todo el contenido extendido, incluso cuando se imprima.

trans-unit.source: By design this <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WriteAsync%2A> method does not call the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WritingPrintTicketRequired> event.
trans-unit.target: Este diseño <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WriteAsync%2A> método no llama a la <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WritingPrintTicketRequired> eventos.

trans-unit.source: An object that contains a pointer to unpaginated source material; also contains methods for paginating the material.
trans-unit.target: Objeto que contiene un puntero a material de origen sin paginar. También contiene métodos para paginar el material.

trans-unit.source: A user-specified object to identify and associate with the asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: Objeto especificado por el usuario para identificar y asociar a la operación asincrónica.

trans-unit.source: Writes asynchronously paginated content from a specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator" /> to the target <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" /> or <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintQueue" />.
trans-unit.target: Escribe contenido paginado de forma asincrónica de una clase <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator" /> especificada en la clase <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" /> o <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintQueue" /> de destino.

trans-unit.source: An object that contains a pointer to unpaginated source material and also contains methods for paginating the material.
trans-unit.target: Objeto que contiene un puntero a material de origen sin paginar y también contiene métodos para paginar el material.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicket" /> that represents the default printing preferences for the material.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicket" /> que representa las preferencias de impresión predeterminadas del material.

trans-unit.source: Writes asynchronously paginated content from a specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator" /> together with a <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicket" /> to the target <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" /> or <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintQueue" />.
trans-unit.target: Escribe contenido paginado de forma asincrónica de un <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator" /> especificado junto con un <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicket" /> en el <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" /> o <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintQueue" /> de destino.

trans-unit.source: This method does not validate or modify the specified `printTicket` for a particular <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>.
trans-unit.target: Este método no valida ni modificar especificado `printTicket` para un determinado <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>.

trans-unit.source: If necessary, use the <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A> method to create a <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> that is specific to the <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> and is valid for a specified printer.
trans-unit.target: Si es necesario, utilice el <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A> método para crear un <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> que es específico de la <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> y es válido para una impresora determinada.

trans-unit.source: A user-specified object to identify and associate with the asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: Objeto especificado por el usuario para identificar y asociar a la operación asincrónica.

trans-unit.source: Writes asynchronously a specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage" /> together with a <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicket" /> to the target <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" /> or <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintQueue" />.
trans-unit.target: Escribe de forma asincrónica una clase <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage" /> especificada junto con una clase <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicket" /> en la clase <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" /> o <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintQueue" /> de destino.

trans-unit.source: This method does not validate or modify the specified `printTicket` for a particular <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>.
trans-unit.target: Este método no valida ni modificar especificado `printTicket` para un determinado <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>.

trans-unit.source: If necessary, use the <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A> method to create a <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> that is specific to the <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> and is valid for a specified printer.
trans-unit.target: Si es necesario, utilice el <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A> método para crear un <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> que es específico de la <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> y es válido para una impresora determinada.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> that is written.
trans-unit.target: Elemento <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> que se escribe.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicket" /> that represents the default printing preferences for the document.
trans-unit.target: Clase <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicket" /> que representa las preferencias de impresión predeterminadas para el documento.

trans-unit.source: A user-specified object to identify and associate with the asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: Objeto especificado por el usuario para identificar y asociar a la operación asincrónica.

trans-unit.source: Writes asynchronously a specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> together with a <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicket" /> to the target <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" /> or <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintQueue" />.
trans-unit.target: Escribe de forma asincrónica una clase <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> especificada junto con una clase <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicket" /> en la clase <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" /> o <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintQueue" /> de destino.

trans-unit.source: For writing multiple <xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual> elements, use <xref:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument>.
trans-unit.target: Para escribir varios <xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual> elementos, utilice <xref:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument>.

trans-unit.source: This method does not validate or modify the specified `printTicket` for a particular <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>.
trans-unit.target: Este método no valida ni modificar especificado `printTicket` para un determinado <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>.

trans-unit.source: If necessary, use the <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A> method to create a <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> that is specific to the <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> and is valid for a specified printer.
trans-unit.target: Si es necesario, utilice el <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A> método para crear un <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> que es específico de la <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> y es válido para una impresora determinada.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a <see cref="Overload:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.Write" /> or <see cref="Overload:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WriteAsync" /> operation is canceled.
trans-unit.target: Se produce cuando se cancela una operación de <see cref="Overload:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.Write" /> o <see cref="Overload:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WriteAsync" />.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a write operation finishes.
trans-unit.target: Se produce cuando finaliza una operación de escritura.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WritingCompleted> event.
trans-unit.target: En el siguiente ejemplo se muestra cómo utilizar el evento <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WritingCompleted>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs just before a <see cref="Overload:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.Write" /> or <see cref="Overload:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WriteAsync" /> method adds a <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicket" /> to a document or print queue.
trans-unit.target: Se produce justo antes de que un método <see cref="Overload:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.Write" /> o <see cref="Overload:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WriteAsync" /> agregue un <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicket" /> a un documento o una cola de impresión.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WritingPrintTicketRequired> enables an event handler to substitute a new <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> for the one that is passed to the write operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WritingPrintTicketRequired> permite que un controlador de eventos que hay que sustituir un nuevo <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> por el que se pasa a la operación de escritura.

trans-unit.source: The following four <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.Write%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WriteAsync%2A> methods do not call the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WritingPrintTicketRequired> event:
trans-unit.target: Las siguientes cuatro <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.Write%2A> y <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WriteAsync%2A> métodos no llame a la <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WritingPrintTicketRequired> eventos:

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.Write%2A>(String)
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.Write%2A>(Cadena)

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.Write%2A>(String, XpsDocumentNotificationLevel)
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.Write%2A>(Cadena, XpsDocumentNotificationLevel)

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WriteAsync%2A>(String)
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WriteAsync%2A>(Cadena)

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WriteAsync%2A>(String, XpsDocumentNotificationLevel)
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WriteAsync%2A>(Cadena, XpsDocumentNotificationLevel)

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WritingPrintTicketRequired> event.
trans-unit.target: En el siguiente ejemplo se muestra cómo utilizar el evento <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WritingPrintTicketRequired>.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is created in the following example.
trans-unit.target: El controlador de eventos se crea en el ejemplo siguiente.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter" /> updates its progress.
trans-unit.target: Se produce cuando <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter" /> actualiza su progreso.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to create and use a <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WritingProgressChanged> event handler.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se muestra cómo crear y usar un <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WritingProgressChanged> controlador de eventos.
